agentSpans.name: multiple_tools_agent

input.content: You are a helpful assistant with access to weather and time tools. When asked about weather, use the get_weather tool. When asked about time, use the get_time tool. Be concise in your responses.
Use the get_time tool exactly once to get the current time in London.

agentSpans.output: The current time in London is 7:00 AM GMT.

name: pydanticai-multiple-tools-time

input.content: You are a helpful assistant with access to weather and time tools. When asked about weather, use the get_weather tool. When asked about time, use the get_time tool. Be concise in your responses.
Use the get_time tool exactly once to get the current time in London.

output: The current time in London is 7:00 AM GMT.
